description:
This is a very basic application for reading the English Standard Version of the bible via the crossway.org web site or offline reading of the King James Version.  It allows for easy selection of a book and chapter and allows for the setting of up up to four bookmarks for quick access.   The app provides the option of viewing only the text, or the full html formatted version via the web site.    You will need to have an active internet connection to read the ESV text.  No internet connection is needed for the King James version.

This is designed as a replacement for a "pew bible" with quick access to passages rather than a full-blown study bible with highlighting, notes, multiple versions, etc.
